short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anonymously collect or view video highlights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Emotion Tracker is the new way of viewing and providing feedback for videos.

When you load a video, you can see highlights, that can be navigated on when clicked. They show where and how others reacted.

You can also turn on expression tracking, which will record your expressions at the current video moment.

Lets change the way we watch video content forever!
